channel.title: [508] Bulby [508]
channel.description:
Edit: Found out what was wrong, Thanks for trying to help.... was importing
[code]TItem[/code]
when i had the file named: [code]Titem[/code]
Difference: Capital I, not lower-case!

item.title: [508] Bulby [508]
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

Replace everything in your TItem.java file with this

/*
 * To change this template, choose Tools | Templates
 * and open the template in the editor.
 */

package DavidScape.players.ptrade;

/**
 *
 * @author Gravediggah
 */
public class TItem {
    private int itemId;
    private int itemAmount;

    public TItem(int itemId, int itemAmount) {
        this.itemId=itemId;
        this.itemAmount=itemAmount;
    }

    public int getItemAmount() {
        return itemAmount;
    }

    public void setItemAmount(int itemAmount) {
        this.itemAmount = itemAmount;
    }

    public int getItemId() {
        return itemId;
    }

    public void setItemId(int itemId) {
        this.itemId = itemId;
    }

    public void incAmount(int value) {
        this.itemAmount+=value;
    }

    public void decAmount(int value) {
        this.itemAmount-=value;
    }

    

}

I’ve added trade heaps of times to bulby, it that don’t work, I’ll do the whole tut.

Read full topic
